title: Unstable ms
body: So for the last week every time i play my ping jumps from 30 to 60 like non stop. so it starts out at 30 then jumps to 60 then back down then back up over and over. Which makes the game laggy af. if anyone knows any fix for this lmk ty.

replies.body: try using haste, it stabilizes the rest of the time but sometimes pop back up. (Windows 8,9,10 ONLy)

Having your ping jump around that often might be a sign that your network is having problems keeping a solid connection with our servers. I'd suggest trying to switch to an ethernet cable if possible, but let's double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might need to be updated.
Contact your ISP. They can check for problems with your internet. You can also use an Ethernet Cable instead of Wi-Fi if you are not already.
